root.name: MechWarrior 4: Inner Sphere 'Mech Pak
root.description: The MechWarrior 4: Inner Sphere 'Mech Pack is a collection of maps and equipment for MechWarrior 4: Vengeance and MechWarrior 4: Mercenaries. The expansion pack includes the following in this iteration:MapsColosseumWeaponryHeavy Gauss RifleTechnologyIFF Jammer (Identify Friendly/Foe)BattleMechsZeus (80 tons)Dragon (60 tons)Highlander (90 tons)Hunchback (50 tons)
